title: Dwarven Armour Training
content:
Dwarven Armour Training Effect You have Armour Proficiency with Light and Medium Armour Requirements Shield Dwarf

Dwarven Armour Training

You have Armour Proficiency with Light and Medium Armour

Dwarven Armour Training is a Subrace Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Dwarven Armour Training is only available to the Shield Dwarf subrace, and grants them proficiency with two types of armor. Features provide unique abilities that are inherent to a Character's Race, Class, Background selected. These may
